attributes.action: Raise the marriage allowance to the full personal allowance of £12750
attributes.additional_details: This reform would effectively double a family's tax free income to £25140, providing much-needed financial breathing room and empowering families to choose for one parent to be a stay-at-home carer for their children.
attributes.background: Currently the UK's personal allowance of £12570 offers individuals a significant tax free income.  We propose a crucial adjustment: enabling the full transfer of a non-working partner's personal allowance to their working spouse.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action:

Allow people to transfer all their personal allowance to their spouse 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/727117
